# Our history
The new xpose was inspired from data vizualization and model diagnostics concepts established by the [xpose4](http://xpose.sourceforge.net) package. Xpose4 was developped by the [Department of Pharmaceutical Biosciences](http://www.farmbio.uu.se/forskning/researchgroups/pharmacometrics/) at Uppsala University:

- Copyright (C) 2009-present Andrew C. Hooker, Mats O. Karlsson and E. Niclas Jonsson.
- Copyright (C) 2005-2008 Andrew C. Hooker, Justin J. Wilkins, Mats O. Karlsson and E. Niclas Jonsson.
- Copyright (C) 1998-2004 E. Niclas Jonsson and Mats O. Karlsson.
